Description: Fragment of oval handle from neck join to sharp turn of a Rhodian pottery transport amphora. Clay fine buff-brown. Rectangular stamp.
Curator's comments: Ink, deleted, '228'. Name Anaxiboulos. Possibly from same die as Alexandria, Greco-Roman Museuim, MGR 261.03 (month Agrianios).
Bibliographic references: Stoddart 1847 / Memoir on the inscribed pottery of Rhodes, Cnidus and other Greek Cities (22)
